snippet.title: Castle Come - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Developer LaufLauf has announced a unique new roguelike called Castle Come, in which you control a literal walking fortress. Your goal is to build your castle, which is essentially a giant walking mech, and make it strong enough so that it can breach the gate. You'll need to scavenge and rebuild your mobile castle as it takes damage from attackers along the way. You'll start small before eventually recruiting a larger crew and building yourself into a giant, intimidating fortress on two (or more) legs. It's in development for PC.
